verbose_text: Four hundred ng of purified dephosphorylated RNA was ligated with 10 U of T4 RNA ligase (Thermo Scientific) in 20 mul of 1x reaction buffer with 0.1 mg of BSA per ml and 40 units of RNaseOUTTM (Invitrogen), for 1 h at 37 degreesC.
